experiences.description: Building solutions for real challenges faced by Tunisian students: professor availability, housing, and academic communication.
experiences.impact: Growing up here taught me that the best technology solves everyday frustrations. DocConnect exists because I've waited outside professors' offices myself.

experiences.description: Taught English to 40+ students using creative methods and basic AI tools. Connected across language and cultural barriers.
experiences.impact: Discovered that technology amplifies human connectionâ€”it doesn't replace it. The best AI tools make teachers more effective, not obsolete.

experiences.description: Facilitated soft skills workshops focusing on communication and leadership. Experienced cultural exchange acceleration.
experiences.impact: Learned that the best solutions emerge when different perspectives meet. This experience shapes how I approach every AI project.

experiences.description: Preparing to work on AI-powered healthcare solutions that improve access and outcomes in resource-constrained environments.
experiences.impact: Ready to apply global perspective and technical skills to healthcare challenges at scale. AI with purpose, impact, and cultural awareness.
